intro.message:
Thank you for contributing to DC/OS!
 CI tests can only run with a Mesosphere employee's approval, and before tests are triggered it might look like your tests have failed. Please contact a repo maintainer and ask them to trigger your tests. If you don't know who to reach out to please ping the community team either via [email](community@dcos.io) or message [DC/OS community slack](chat.dcos.io). We are actively working on improving this contribution experience, so stay tuned.
Thanks again for your contribution!
